DOC.brief_summary: This single-institution , prospective , one-to-one randomize control research study . Subjects medically determine need cholecystectomy consent surgery study participation prior enrolment study . Patients randomize receive either single port laparoscopic cholecystectomy four port laparoscopic cholecystectomy .
